env HOME=$WORK/home

benchinit -benchtime=10x .
stdout '^BenchmarkTestTldFoo'
stdout '0 B/op\s*0 allocs/op' # doesn't alloc

benchinit -r -benchtime=10x .
stdout '^BenchmarkTestTldFoo'
! stdout '0 B/op\s*0 allocs/op' # imported pkg allocs

-- go.mod --
module test.tld/foo
-- import.go --
package foo

import _ "test.tld/foo/bar"
-- bar/alloc.go --
package bar

var Sink []int

func init() {
	Sink = make([]int, 128)
}
